# ShiftRightby8 test cases by Michael McQuade

# not doing anything to input
testCase {
1000 1111 1010 1110 0000 0101 0110 0010, 0 0,
1000 1111 1010 1110 0000 0101 0110 0010
}

# logical shift
testCase {
1000 1111 1010 1110 0000 0101 0110 0010, 1 0,
0000 0000 1000 1111 1010 1110 0000 0101
}

# arithmetic shift
testCase {
1000 1111 1010 1110 0000 0101 0110 0010, 1 1,
1111 1111 1000 1111 1010 1110 0000 0101
}

# arithmetic on but high order bit is 0
testCase {
0100 1111 1010 1110 0000 0101 0110 0010, 1 1,
0000 0000 0100 1111 1010 1110 0000 0101
}
